IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE TOLEDO CULTURAL ARTS CENTER, A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION, PRODUCES AND PROVIDES CULTURAL AND PERFORMING ARTS EXPERIENCES FOR DIVERSE AUDIENCES OF ALL AGES IN THE CITY OF TOLEDO, LUCAS COUNTY, NORTHWEST OHIO AND SOUTHEAST MICHIGAN.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE TOLEDO CULTURAL ARTS CENRE INC PRODUCES AND PROVIDES CULTURAL AND PERFORMING ARTS EXPERIENCES FOR DIVERSE AUDIENCES OF ALL AGES, TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF THE CULTURAL AND ECONOMIC LIFE OF THE CITY OF TOLEDO, LUCAS COUNTY, NORTHWEST OHIO AND SOUTHEAST MICHIGAN.
IRS990.Desc: WE PRESENTED A DIVERSE SELECTION OF PERFORMING ARTS EVENTS, RANGING FROM CHILDREN'S PROGRAMMING TO THEATRICAL BROADWAY. A TOTAL OF 102 EVENTS WERE PRESENTED IN THIS FISCAL YEAR, DRAWING 51,143 PATRONS TO THE VALENTINE THEATRE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: OPERATOR AND LANDLORD OF THE HISTORIC VALENTINE THEATRE. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE UPKEEP AND MAINTENANCE OF THE THEATRE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ART COLLECTIONS INCLUDE A MURAL OF $100,000 AND A PORTRAIT OF $13,812. THE MURAL WAS FUNDED BY THE PUBLIC TO PAY HOMAGE TO THE PERFORMERS WHO APPEARED AT THE TOLEDO CULTURAL ARTS CENTER, INC., ALSO KNOWN AS THE VALENTINE THEATRE SINCE IT OPENED IN 1895. THE PORTRAIT WAS TO HONOR THE FATHER OF THE FOUNDER WHOM THE THEATRE WAS NAMED AFTER.

THE ENDOWMENT FUND CONSISTS SOLELY OF BOARD-DESIGNATED FUNDS THAT ARE REVIEWED REGULARLY BY THE BOARD OF VALENTINE FOUNDATION, LLC. THE ENDOWMENT WAS SET UP TO PROVIDE THE ANNUAL SUPPORT FOR THE COSTS OF OPERATION AND MANAGEMENT OF THE TOLEDO CULTURAL ARTS CENTER PROPERTY.

- MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION IS REQUIRED TO DETERMINE WHETHER A TAX POSITION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE APPLICABLE TAXING AUTHORITY, INCLUDING RESOLUTION OF ANY RELATED APPEALS OR LITIGATION PROCESSES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT AWARE OF ANY TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT THE TOTAL AMOUNTS OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WILL SIGNIFICANTLY CHANGE IN THE NEXT 12 MONTHS. HOWEVER, MANAGEMENT'S CONCLUSIONS MAY BE SUBJECT TO REVIEW AND ADJUSTMENT AT A LATER DATE BASED ON FACTORS INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NEW TAX LAWS, REGULATIONS, AND ADMINISTRATIVE INTERPRETATIONS(INCLUDING RELEVANT COURT DECISIONS). THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL TAX RETURNS FOR THE PRIOR THREE FISCAL YEARS REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.
OTHER TOTAL ($206,754)=FUNDRAISING EVENT DIRECT EXPENSES ($131,786) +COGS ($55,217) + PNC SEAT TAX-PRESENTING ($4,809) + PNC SEAT TAX-RENTAL ($14,942)
OTHER TOTAL $206,754=FUNDRAISING EVENT DIRECT EXPENSES $131,786 +COGS $55,217 + PNC SEAT TAX-PRESENTING $4,809 + PNC SEAT TAX-RENTAL $14,942

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE 990 IS DISTRIBUTED VIA EMAIL TO THE FULL BOARD OF TOLEDO CULTURAL ARTS CENTER INC FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENT. THE 990 IS REVISED BASED ON BOARD INPUT. BOTH THE BOARD CHAIR AND CHAIR OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE HAVE TO REVIEW AND APPROVE BEFORE THE FILING. THE FINAL VERSION OF THE 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD UPON FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD EACH YEAR FOR THEIR REVIEW AND SIGNATURE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF TCAC'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS DETERMINED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD. SEVERAL FACTORS INCLUDING INDIVIDUAL PERFORMANCE, BUDGET PERFORMANCE, AND MARKET RATES OF COMPENSATION FOR SIMILAR SITUATED POSITIONS AND ORGANIZATIONS IN THE US ARE EVALUATED BY THE COMMITTEE. NO OTHER OFFICER OF TCAC IS COMPENSATED AND NO EMPLOYEES MEET THE CONDITIONS OF "KEY EMPLOYEE" LINE 15B-NO OTHER OFFICER OF TCAC IS COMPENSATED AND NO EMPLOYEES MEET THE CONDITIONS OF "KEY EMPLOYEE."

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. ALSO, THE FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION ON ANOTHER'S WEBSITE WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE GENERALLY NOT PROVIDED TO THE PUBLIC, OTHER THAN THOSE REQUIRED TO BE DISCLOSED BY LAW. OTHER INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THE ORGANIZATION AND VALENTINE THEATRE CAN BE FOUND ON OUR WEBSITE AT HPPT://VALENTINETHEATRE.COM

(b)Program Services $299,370: Artist Fee $246,021 + Security-Presenting Shows $4,786 +Security-Rental Shows $11,770 + Casual Labor $36,058 + Lobby Security $735 (c)Management & General $15,401: Casual Labor $15,401 (d)Fundraising $3,822: Casual Labor $3,822
